edited_stories.edited_story_text: We went to the fair in the town. People had all their bikes, motorcycles, and cars there.  There were many people dressed up in their costumes for the fair. The police were there to show their support. The man in the red costume was the winner of the event .

edited_stories.edited_story_text: Nothing like moving by bicycle . We transported our stuff by any means possible. Some people had a little too much fun transporting our clothes . It actually ended up being a lot of fun . At the end, we all relaxed and had a little party .
